20110103150222.000|20110103150224.000|CC1|INVOLVING SEXUALLY EXPLICIT     
20110103150224.000|20110103150226.000|CC1|BEHAVIOR IN THE U.S. MILITARY.

20110103150231.000|20110103150233.000|CC1|COMMANDER OF THE USS ENTERPRISE.

20110103150309.000|20110103150312.000|CC1|THE SHOWER IN A CLIP PREVIOUSLY 
20110103150312.000|20110103150314.000|CC1|TOO SENSITIVE TO SHOW.          
20110103150314.000|20110103150316.000|CC1|>> HONORS THE STAR OF THE VIDEOS
20110103150316.000|20110103150321.000|CC1|AND THE NUMBER TWO OFFICER AT   
20110103150321.000|20110103150322.000|CC1|THE TIME.

20110103150715.000|20110103150715.000|CC1|NOT GOING TO HAPPEN.            
20110103150715.000|20110103150718.000|CC1|IT'S NOT GOING TO BE REPEALED   
20110103150718.000|20110103150719.000|CC1|EVEN IF HOUSE REPUBLICANS CAN   
20110103150719.000|20110103150720.000|CC1|PASS A REPEAL THE SENATE WOULD  
20110103150720.000|20110103150722.000|CC1|HAVE TO BRING IT UP.

20110103153733.000|20110103153735.000|CC1|That's the day you do something.
20110103153735.000|20110103153736.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20110103153736.000|20110103153736.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20110103153736.000|20110103153740.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20110103153740.000|20110103153740.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20110103153740.000|20110103153742.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20110103153742.000|20110103153742.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20110103153742.000|20110103153745.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20110103153745.000|20110103153745.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20110103153745.000|20110103153745.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20110103153745.000|20110103153749.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20110103153749.000|20110103153749.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20110103153749.000|20110103153751.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110103153751.000|20110103153751.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20110103153751.000|20110103153753.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20110103153753.000|20110103153753.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20110103153753.000|20110103153756.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20110103153756.000|20110103153756.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain    
20110103153756.000|20110103153758.000|CC1|           relievers,           
20110103153758.000|20110103153758.000|CC1| aspirin, or blood thinners may 
20110103153758.000|20110103153800.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.     
20110103153800.000|20110103153800.000|CC1|  Severe liver problems, some   
20110103153800.000|20110103153803.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20110103153803.000|20110103153803.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20110103153803.000|20110103153806.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20110103153806.000|20110103153806.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20110103153806.000|20110103153808.000|CC1|           medicines,           
20110103153808.000|20110103153808.000|CC1|including those for migraine, or
20110103153808.000|20110103153811.000|CC1|    if you have high fever,     
20110103153811.000|20110103153812.000|CC1|  confusion and stiff muscles,  
20110103153812.000|20110103153812.000|CC1|     to address a possible      
20110103153812.000|20110103153814.000|CC1|  life-threatening condition.   
20110103153814.000|20110103153814.000|CC1| Tell your doctor about alcohol 
20110103153814.000|20110103153817.000|CC1|      use, liver disease,       
20110103153817.000|20110103153817.000|CC1| and before you reduce or stop  
20110103153817.000|20110103153819.000|CC1|        taking Cymbalta.        
20110103153819.000|20110103153819.000|CC1|Dizziness or fainting may occur 
20110103153819.000|20110103153821.000|CC1|         upon standing.         
20110103153821.000|20110103153821.000|CC1|Side effects include nausea, dry
20110103153821.000|20110103153825.000|CC1|    mouth, and constipation.    
20110103153825.000|20110103153826.000|CC1|      Is today your day?        
20110103153826.000|20110103153827.000|CC1|      Talk to your doctor...    
20110103153827.000|20110103153827.000|CC1|  and go to Cymbalta.com for a
